title: Trash, Tilted Jg/Sup main looking for help :c
body: Gold 4 currently, tilted from Gold 1. I'm sad. Pls help.

replies.body: I'll add you in game, D3 Jg main.

Hi mate, I am no pro.
But I used to tilt a lot... and now... I never tilt.
If you wanna know my secret.... you only have to click this click bait link and pay me... i mean them.... $89.95.
And you too, can not tilt.

Jokes.

Look into mindfulness.
Google it.

Use this method after every game.
Use it in the loading screen.
Use it in your life.

You will become zen AF.

Trust.

God speed.
I uninstalled it for a week haha
The game isnt worth tilting over after every game u should have a break if u have a game where u tilt after that game dont play anymore for that day or for 5 hours at least
